name: create_escrow
attributes: # [doc = " エスクロー初期化：売り手・買い手・金額・期限を受け取り、状態・タイムスタンプをまとめて設定"]
body: * ctx . accounts . escrow = Escrow { seller : ctx . accounts . seller . key () , bump , escrow_id , buyer , amount , deposited : false , state : String :: from ("created") , deadline , updated_ts : ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp , } ;

name: deposit_funds
attributes: # [doc = " 入金処理：買い手の署名チェック後、入金フラグとタイムスタンプを更新"]
body: let e = & mut ctx . accounts . escrow ;
e . updated_ts = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;

name: release_funds
attributes: # [doc = " 売り手による支払い完了：状態とタイムスタンプを更新"]
body: let e = & mut ctx . accounts . escrow ;
e . updated_ts = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;

name: refund_funds
attributes: # [doc = " 売り手による返金：状態とタイムスタンプを更新"]
body: let e = & mut ctx . accounts . escrow ;
e . updated_ts = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;

fields.name: escrow
fields.attribute: # [doc = " PDA で生成する Escrow アカウント"] # [account (init , payer = seller , space = 8 + 32 + 1 + 8 + 32 + 8 + 1 + 4 + 10 + 8 + 8 , seeds = [b"escrow" , seller . key () . as_ref () , & escrow_id . to_le_bytes ()] , bump)]

fields.name: clock
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 現在のブロック時間を取得"]

fields.name: escrow
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 既存の Escrow（PDA 検証 + has_one = buyer）"] # [account (mut , seeds = [b"escrow" , escrow . seller . as_ref () , & escrow . escrow_id . to_le_bytes ()] , bump = escrow . bump , has_one = buyer)]

fields.name: escrow
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 既存の Escrow（PDA 検証 + has_one = seller）"] # [account (mut , seeds = [b"escrow" , escrow . seller . as_ref () , & escrow . escrow_id . to_le_bytes ()] , bump = escrow . bump , has_one = seller)]
